item.description:
The second Thursday of every month New Bedford has an evening of entertainment sponsored by AHA! (art, history, and architecture). The group has gone many times and it's always fun. The theme for this evening, October 13, is Fables and Folklore. When you look on the calendar (link below) you will see lectures, gallery shows, and live music. Two items of interest: Poe readings at the Rotch-Jones-Duff house and a new show at Gallery X.

Here is the AHA! website: http://www.ahanewbedf...

After we check out a bunch of events, we'll grab some dinner.

You can park for free on the street around 6, or if you decide to come much earlier just bring a couple quarters for the meters. You can also park in the garage on Elm Street.

I will e-mail my cell number to Yes responders on the day of the event.

Come out for a night of free entertainment! Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: look for me in the lobby -- tall, chin-length hair, thick glasses

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: AHA! night in New Bedford
